short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Staging release of Dat-Empower. This version to be used by Dat-Empower testers only.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Staging release of Dat-Empower. This one is used by Dat-Empower testing and development team. If you are a Dat-Empower user, please download the official Dat-Empower Release.
